word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指愿望或期望的落空。
普通用词，指因灾难等因素而丧失希望和信心，陷入沮丧，绝望的境地。
语气强烈，指因绝望而使人采取无所顾忌的疯狂行动。
侧重指因遭受重大失利或挫折而产生的低落情绪。

bilingual.target: 而抑郁会让你非常非常沮丧。

bilingual.source: Depression may also be acting as a stressor.
bilingual.target: 沮丧也可以成为一种压力。

bilingual.source: As I packed, a deep depression overtook me.
bilingual.target: 当我在打包时, 深深的沮丧掳获了我.

bilingual.source: As i packed , a deep depression overtook me
bilingual.target: 当我在打包时，深深的沮丧掳获了我。

bilingual.source: Have frustration and depression been your best friends?
bilingual.target: 沮丧和忧愁是否拜访你的常客?。

bilingual.source: For all these reasons the composer fell into deep depression.
bilingual.target: 由于所有这些，作曲家深陷沮丧。

list.abstract: 抑郁症，别称忧郁症、抑郁障碍，是一种患病率高、治疗率低、复发率高的人体精神上常见的精神类疾病，是心境障碍的主要类型。 抑郁症可发生于各个年龄，主要特征为显著而持久的心境低落、思维迟缓和身体的疲劳衰弱，部分患者可能有自伤和自杀倾向，以及多种躯体不适。病因包括生理、心理、环境和家庭因素等。抑郁症会损害患者社会功能，增加自杀风险等。预防途径包括提高个人适应能力和减少抑郁易感性。抑郁症可以治愈，越早干预治愈率越高，治疗方式包括药物治疗、心理治疗、物理治疗、社会支持等。 抑郁症分为轻度、中度和重度，治疗方法因状态而异。轻度抑郁症患者可能自愈，但最好配合医生进行系统治疗。 忧郁症和抑郁症的区别在于症状严重程度、持续时间和危害程度。忧郁症症状较轻，不易导致严重的心理和身体健康问题，而抑郁症的危害相对较大。
《Depression》是《浮夸》的原曲，作曲人C.Y.Kong（江志仁）2003年4月1日晚上在伦敦听到好友张国荣的死讯之后写下来的，表达他听到消息时的震撼悲痛和不解，是一首痛失好友的悼亡之作。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, moving to psychiatric disorders. List all major behavioral diagnoses, depression, anxiety, etc.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，下面是精神疾病的问题，列出所有重大行为方面的病症例如沮丧、焦虑等等。

yingyinNormal.en: This can also lead to a fairly severe hangover with side effects such as negative mood, spouts of depression, irritability and feeling extra tired.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同时也导致严重像宿醉的感觉，伴随着心情低落、沮丧、易怒、容易觉得累等等副作用。

yingyinNormal.en: The booklets and the websites always list depression as a side effect of cancer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 传单和网页上写的都是抑郁症就像癌症的并发症。

yingyinNormal.en: Doctors killed 1,807 people last year in Belgium. Some only suffering from depression.
yingyinNormal.zh: 医生们去年在比利时终结了1807人的生命，其中有些人仅仅是患有抑郁症。

yingyinNormal.en: Something terrible happened to me in 1982, when I bet everything on a depression that never came.
yingyinNormal.zh: 1982年我遇到了可怕的事，我把注都压在萧条上，但萧条并未发生。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, pretty close. Okay. Ever take anything for depression? Prozac. But it made me gain weight, so I…
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，差不多。好的。服用过抗抑郁药物吗？百忧解。但那让我体重上升,所以...

yingyinNormal.en: Depression's not a side effect of cancer. It's a side effect of dying, which is what was happening to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抑郁症不是癌症的并发症，而是将死的并发症。而我曾经差点就死了。

yingyinNormal.en: The Rockefeller Center, a visionary city within a city, rose during the darkest days of the Great Depression.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洛克菲勒中心是有远见的城中城，于最黑暗的经济大萧条时期落成。

yingyinNormal.en: Sean suffered from anxiety and depression. His mother claimed this started during his time as Fletcher's student.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肖恩患有长期焦虑抑郁症，他母亲说这是在跟了弗莱彻之后开始的。

yingyinNormal.en: Heart problems? No. Any history of mental illness, depression, panic attacks? Just a little fear of clowns. I'm joking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有心脏病吗？没有。有精神病史吗？像是抑郁症，恐慌发作？我只怕小丑，开玩笑的。

yingyinNormal.en: When the President and I took office in January of 2009, this nation was in the midst of the greatest economic crisis since the great depression.
yingyinNormal.zh: 2009年1月，在总统和我主政之初，全国正深陷自大萧条以来最严重的经济危机之中。

yingyinNormal.en: My big mistake in betting on a depression gave me a healthy fear of being wrong. In other words, it gave me deep humility, which was exactly what I needed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在萧条中犯下的错误让我对错误有了健康的恐惧。换句话来说它让我非常谦卑，我正需要这一点。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the courage I spoke of earlier, and we each have to feel these things out for ourselves. After my big mistake in calling for a depression, I had come to one of life's forks in the road, as we all do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是我之前说过的勇气，我们每个人都需要自己摸索。在我犯下萧条的错误之后，像所有人一样我来到了人生中的一个岔路口。

yingyinNormal.en: With that perspective, I realized that what I missed when I mistakenly called for a great depression was hidden in the patterns of history, and I could use my newfound knowledge of these patterns to make better decisions in the future.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有了这种眼光我意识到自己预测大萧条时忽视的就隐藏在历史规律中，我可以利用对这些规律的新了解在未来做更好的决策。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Other reasons, according to the study, include personal fulfillment such as staying mentally fit, preventing boredom or avoiding <highlight>depression</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这项研究，其他原因还包括个人成就感，如保持精神健康、防止无聊或避免抑郁。

sense_info_list.en: a mental illness in which a person is very unhappy and anxious

examination_example.sentence: 20 percent of Americans who have been unemployed for at least a year report having <highlight>depression</highlight>, double the rate for working Americans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 失业至少一年的美国人中有20%称患有抑郁症，这一比例是美国工薪阶层的两倍。

sense_info_list.en: a period of low general economic activity marked especially by rising levels of unemployment

examination_example.sentence: Parents, who lived through the worst US economic downturn since the Great <highlight>Depression</highlight>, tell them to avoid the factory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些经历了大萧条以来美国经济最糟糕时期的父母，告诉他们要避开工厂。

sense_info_list.en: a place or part that is lower than the surrounding area

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 临床抑郁症；临床抑郁；临床忧郁症

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a mental illness in which a person is very unhappy and anxious

examination_example.sentence: After four months, the patients using the computerized CBT programs had no improvement in <highlight>depression</highlight> levels over the patients who were only getting usual care from their doctors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四个月后，与只接受常规治疗的患者相比，接受线上认知行为疗法的患者的抑郁水平并没有得到改善。

examination_example.sentence: Participants were balanced across the three groups for age, sex, educational background, severity and duration of <highlight>depression</highlight>, and use of antidepressants (抗抑郁药) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参与者在年龄、性别、教育背景、抑郁的严重程度和持续时间以及抗抑郁药的使用方面在三组之间保持平衡。

examination_example.sentence: The study looked at computer-assisted cognitive (认知的) behavioral therapy (CBT) and found that it was no more effective in treating <highlight>depression</highlight> than the usual care patients receive from a primary care doctor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对计算机辅助认知行为疗法研究后发现，与主治医生提供的常规护理相比，该疗法在治疗抑郁症方面效果并不显著。

examination_example.sentence: Traditional CBT is considered an effective form of talk therapy for <highlight>depression</highlight>, helping people challenge negative thoughts and change the way they think in order to change their mood and behaviors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 传统的认知行为疗法(CBT)是有效治疗抑郁症的一种谈话疗法，帮助患者与消极思维作斗争，改变他们的思维方式，从而改善情绪和行为方式。

examination_example.sentence: The number of people experiencing <highlight>depression</highlight> shows a sharp increase in the first year of high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经历抑郁症的人数在高中一年级表现出一个急剧的增加。

examination_example.sentence: Co-author Mathew White, from the University of Exeter, UK, explained that the study showed people living in greener urban areas were displaying fewer signs of <highlight>depression</highlight> or anxiety.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来自英国埃克塞特大学的合著者 Mathew White 解释说，该研究表明，生活在绿色城市地区的人们出现抑郁或焦虑迹象的情况较少。

examination_example.sentence: There are many things that can cause confusion and memory loss, including health problems like temporary stoppage of breathing during sleep, high blood pressure, or <highlight>depression</highlight>, as well as medications (药物) like antidepressants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有很多原因会引起混乱和记忆力减退，包括健康问题，例如睡眠中暂时停止呼吸，高血压或抑郁，以及抗抑郁药等药物。

sense_info_list.en: a period of low general economic activity marked especially by rising levels of unemployment

examination_example.sentence: It is reported that <highlight>depression</highlight> results in enormous economic losses worldwide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据报道，经济萧条在世界范围内造成了巨大的经济损失。

sense_info_list.en: a place or part that is lower than the surrounding area

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重指因遭受重大失利或挫折而产生的低落情绪。
普通用词，指因灾难等因素而丧失希望和信心，陷入沮丧，绝望的境地。
语气强烈，指因绝望而使人采取无所顾忌的疯狂行动。
多指愿望或期望的落空。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 抑郁; 沮丧; 消沉

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 抑郁; 沮丧; 消沉

examination_example.sentence: This has caused many problems，such as an increase in obesity (肥胖) and <highlight>depression</highlight> (抑郁) among children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这导致了许多问题，例如儿童肥胖和抑郁的增加。
